Sunrise|Rise.desc: Golden light spilling over a low eastern ridge as the first rays of morning break across a misty valley. Warm haze clings to rolling hills while the sky shifts from deep violet to amber.

Sunrise|Grow.desc: A sun-drenched hillside where wildflowers stretch toward the brightening sky, dew catching the first light. Tender green shoots push through rich soil as dawn washes over the landscape.

Sunrise|Shine.desc: Brilliant morning sunlight reflecting off a glassy lake surrounded by silhouetted pines, the entire scene glowing with radiant warmth. Beams of light pierce through scattered clouds.

Forest|Pine.desc: Towering evergreen pines rising into a cool overcast sky, their dark needles forming a dense canopy over a carpet of fallen needles and soft moss.

Sky|Wind.desc: Sweeping cloud formations streaking across a vast open sky above windswept grasslands, the atmosphere alive with motion and shifting light.
